metadata.subject: Representative government and representation
Political candidates
metadata.title: La véritable liste des candidats : précédée d'observations sur la nature de l'institution des candidats, et son application au gouvernement représentatif.
metadata.creator: Quatremère de Quincy, M. (Antoine-Chrysostome), 1755-1849.

Desenne, Victor, publisher

metadata.description: By Antoine-Chrysostome Quatremère de Quincy. Cf. Martin & Walter
"De l'imprimerie de Fauvelle et Sagnier, rue Neuve-d'Orléans, boulevard S.-Denis, no 230"--Colophon

metadata.notes:
Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
No Copyright found. No Table of Contents found.
